name: run_command
description:
Allows command (CLI) execution in the directory: /app/sample-project

Available commands: ls, pwd, tree, wc, grep, tail, echo, head, cat, find
Available flags: -h, -l, --help, --version, -v, -n, -w, -R, -A, -a, -B, -c, -C, -i, -r, -la

Shell operators (&&, ||, |, >, >>, <, <<, ;) are not supported. Set ALLOW_SHELL_OPERATORS=true to enable.

command.description: Single command to execute (example: 'ls -l' or 'cat file.txt')

name: show_security_rules
description: Show what commands and operations are allowed in this environment.
